alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Monmouth; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:28PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SOMERSET...NORTHEASTERN MONMOUTH AND MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Huguenot, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Sandy Hook, Somerset, Edison, Middletown, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Carteret, Manville, Matawan, Jamesburg, Highlands, Millstone, Princeton Meadows, Brownville and Dayton. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 9 and 13. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 7, and between mile markers 9 and 11. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 114 and 132. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
